text: Arra ga yogen-sha-tachi to yakusoku sa reta toki o omoe. (Kare wa ose rareta). `Ware wa Keisuke to eichi to o anata gata ni sazukeru. Sonogo de, anata gata ga motsu (Keisuke) o jissho suru tame, hitori no shito ga anata gata no tokoro ni kurudearou. (Sonotoki) anata gata wa kare o shinji, kare o tasuke nasai.' Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata gata wa kore o shochi suru ka. Ko no koto ni tsuite, wareto katai yakusoku o suru ka' kare-ra wa moshiageta,`shochishimashita'`sorenara anata gata wa shogen shi nasai. Ware mo anata gata to tomoni rissho shiyou.' To ose rareta
